MESA on Linux with reference to KSP

Install and update?

Edited July 6, 2015 by Daveroski

Two days and no response. Maybe the question was a little complicated.

I'll try and dumb it down a little.

Does KSP need or use MESA on Linux?
MESA is the OpenGL implementation most Linux distributions use. Yes, you need it. But it should already be installed, the majority of modern desktops use some sort of 3D compositing by default.
